description.string: 1Auth is an all-in-one authentication client that we designed to work seamlessly with any website.

clients.string: {0, plural, one {We support {0} client with many more to come.} other {We support {0} clients with many more to come.}}

streamlined.string: We designed 1Auth so that adding it to your site is as streamlined as possible.

initiate.string: When a user clicks ‚ÄúSign in‚Äù on your site, direct them to this URL:

after.string: After the user clicks on the link and finishes authentication with us, we will redirect them to whatever URL you used in place of {0} above.

parameter.string: If they allowed sharing their data, then there will be a new query parameter on that URL, {0}.

get.string: To retrieve the user‚Äôs information, send the following HTTP request, where {0} is the value of the said parameter:

denied.string: If they denied sharing their data, then there will not be any new query parameter.

configuration.string: More configuration options are coming soon.

CODE.developer_comment: You will have to switch to raw editor mode to translate this string. AKA a token. This is surrounded by angle brackets to indicate that this is a placeholder value. If your language uses different symbols to indicate placeholders, please use them instead. Please replace spaces with underscores. In addition, please keep this uppercase.

CALLBACK.developer_comment: You will have to switch to raw editor mode to translate this string. This is surrounded by angle brackets to indicate that this is a placeholder value. If your language uses different symbols to indicate placeholders, please use them instead. Please replace spaces with underscores. In addition, please keep this uppercase.

basics.string: Specify the language to use on pages by adding another parameter to the URL: {0}

code.string: Its value should be a 2-letter language code like {0} or {1}.

country.string: You may follow it by an underscore and a 2-letter country code, e.g. {0} or {1} (optional).

fallback.string: If a language is not available, it will fall back to the non-country-specific language, then to the users‚Äô browser language.

few.string: Please note that we do not have many translations, if any.

grows.string: That will change as our translation team grows.

help.string: If you would like to help us translate, please click here.

account.string: Create a Transifex account if you do not already have one, then click ‚ÄúJoin team‚Äù.
account.developer_comment: Please make sure that you translate ‚ÄúJoin team‚Äù exactly it appears on Transifex.

thanks.string: Thanks for your eagerness to help!

request.string: (Please note that if your language is not in the list, you will have to scroll down to the bottom and click ‚ÄúRequest language‚Äù first.)
request.developer_comment: Please make sure that you translate ‚ÄúRequest language‚Äù exactly how it appears on Transifex.

email.string: To continue, please enter your email.

code.string: To continue, please enter the code we sent you.

share.string: Don‚Äôt share it with anyone else.

act.string: Otherwise, they could be able to act on your behalf.

paste.string: Paste your code in the box and press ‚Äú{0}‚Äù.

review.string: Review the information we will send and the site we will send it to, and if all looks good, press ‚Äú{0}‚Äù.

expire.string: Your code will expire after 15 minutes, so if it doesn‚Äôt work, it might have been too long.

rerequest.string: Try pressing the back button and requesting another code!

question.string: Do you want {0} to access your information?

recieve.string: If you press ‚Äú{2}‚Äù, then {1} will receive the following information (taken from your {0} account):

hidden.string: Unfortunately, we can‚Äôt show this data right now.

logo.developer_comment: Alt text of a logo image. Example: ‚ÄúGoogle icon‚Äù, ‚ÄúEmail icon‚Äù, etc.

thisLanguage.developer_comment: This should be changed to the language you are translating to. For example, if you are translating to ‚ÄúSpanish (United States)‚Äù, you would translate this as ‚ÄúEspa√±ol (Estados Unidos)‚Äù. Find out what language you are on up there üëÜ.

scratch.string: Scratch is developed by the Lifelong Kindergarten Group at the MIT Media Lab.

google.string: Google and the Google logo are registered trademarks of Google LLC in some countries.

replit.string: Replit and the Replit logo are registered trademarks of Replit, Inc. in some countries.

github.string: GITHUB¬Æ, and the GITHUB¬Æ logo design are exclusive trademarks registered in the United States by GitHub, Inc.

license.string: The source code of 1Auth is available under the {0}.

message.string: Please continue with your request.
Switching from HTTP to HTTPS.
We have received your request. Please wait.
Here are some resources that you will need. While you wait for the rest of the response, please start loading them.
An item in our databases has successfully been created.
Your request has been accepted and understood. We forwarded it to another server.
This information is from a backup copy and may not be up-to-date. Please do not rely on it being correct.
Your request was successful. However, we don‚Äôt have any information to give you in response.
Your request was successful. Reset any pages that use our APIs as the content may have changed.
We have already reported this information to you.
We used some instance-manipulations on the current instance. Here is the result.
Please pick a redirection method or location to continue.
The requested page has not been modified since the last request.
Oops! Your request was invalid. Please make sure all needed information is sent, no extra information is sent, and all sent information is valid. If this keeps happening, try contacting us on GitHub.
Please login before accessing this resource.
Please pay before accessing this page.
Sorry, but you are forbidden to access this resource.
Uh-oh! We can‚Äôt find that page! Go back? If a link on this site brought you here, you may want to contact us on GitHub and let us know we have a broken link.
That HTTP method isn‚Äôt supported on this page! Try a different page and/or method.
We can‚Äôt match the data requested with the format requested.
Please use a proxy to access this resource.

Hmm‚Ä¶ the page was loading for quite a while and timed out! Perhaps there was an internal error. Try reloading the page. If this keeps happening, you may want to contact us on GitHub so we can fix it.
Oops, there was a conflict between the information your browser sent and the information we have! Try reloading the page. If this keeps happening, try contacting us on GitHub so we can fix it.
This isn‚Äôt here anymore. Unfortunately, it‚Äôs never coming back.
You didn‚Äôt say how much information you wanted! Please repeat the request with a requested length.
Unfortunately, we can‚Äôt meet your conditions. Too bad!
You sent so much data that we can‚Äôt process it!
That URL is too long for us to understand!
You sent the wrong type of file!
We don‚Äôt have any data in the requested range.
We expected to receive more information than you sent!
We refuse to try and brew coffee with a teapot.
You sent this request to the wrong place!
There are semantic errors in your request.
The requested resource is locked.
Please wait before sending this request.
Please use HTTPS, not HTTP.
You can‚Äôt do that yet. Please fulfill the requested conditions first.
You have sent too many requests in a short amount of time. Please wait before sending more.
The headers of your request are too long to be processed.
Unfortunately, we cannot legally provide this page to you. Sorry about that!
Uh-oh, you found a bug! We ran into an unexpected error. Please report it on GitHub so we can stop this from happening again.
No part of our website supports that HTTP method. Try a different one!
We got an invalid response from an external service.
Sorry! This page is currently down! It should be back up soon!
An external server didn‚Äôt send us a response fast enough.
No part of our website supports that HTTP version. Try a different one!
Error in our internal configuration! Please report this on GitHub so we can prevent it from happening again.
Our servers do not have enough storage to store the data needed to complete your request.
Ummm‚Ä¶ there‚Äôs an infinite loop somewhere in the code! As such, we can‚Äôt complete your request! You may want to contact us on GitHub and let us know about this.
We can‚Äôt show you this page with the information given. Please extend your request.
Please sign in to the network before accessing the Internet.

heading.string: You are using an outdated browser!

why.string: For a better experience on {0} sites (not only on ours), please keep your browser up to date.
why.developer_comment: The placeholder is always the word ‚Äúall‚Äù. (I had to move it out into a separate string so that I could underline it.)

mistake.string: If you are using a modern browser, please make sure that you have enabled and allowed JavaScript on this site.

chrome.developer_comment: Please make sure that you translate this exactly how it appears on the browser‚Äôs website.

edge.developer_comment: Please make sure that you translate this exactly how it appears on the browser‚Äôs website.

firefox.developer_comment: Please make sure that you translate this exactly how it appears on the browser‚Äôs website.

safari.developer_comment: Please make sure that you translate this exactly how it appears on the browser‚Äôs website.
